بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
إلى الشّيخ الأجل القاضي الحكم أدام اللّه بقاه
وأطال نعماه وبه ومن نــســأل حسن نسل توفيقه لا
وجعلني من كل سو هذا فداء فداءه من عند عند
للمولا
إلى ساحل القصير
أبو حسن الحسن الحسين علي المعوّل دامت سعادته

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi ***
ʾilà ăš šayḫi ăl ʾaǧalli ăl qāḍī ăl ḥakami ʾadāma ăl lāhu baqāʾa hu
wa ʾaṭāla naʿmāʾa hu wa wa bi min hi ø nasʾalu ḥusni nasalu tawfīqa tawfīqi hi hu *** lā ø ʾaḫlā ø hu
*** wa ǧaʿala nī min kulli sūʾ:in hāḏā fidāʾ:an fidāʾa ø ø hu min ʿabdi ʿindi ***
*** li l mawlā ***
ʾilà sāḥili ăl quṣayri ***
ʾabū ø ăl ăl ḥasan:in ḥasani ḥusayni ʿaliyy:uni ăl muʿawwalu dāmat saʿādatu hu

In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
To the most noble shaykh, the qāḍī, the municipal judge - may God prolong his life!
... [May God make permanent] his well-being and [not deny him] His superior gift of success! May God sustain his bounty! Of God we ask for his success! [...]
And may He make me his ransom from all evil! ... [......] and spare me from all the evils! - : This [letter] is from the servant [......] ... und Er möge mich zu seinem Lösegeld von jedem Überl machen ...
[.........] to the master [...........]
To the shore of Quseir [..........]
Abū Ḥasan ʿAlī al-Muʿawwal - may his happiness last forever!
